name: Sample Item
description: This is a sample structure of an item. This must not be loaded into the database.

name: Wood
description: A basic material needed for every uses.

name: Stick
description: A small stick. Can be used to craft all sort of tools.

name: Wood Pickaxe
description: A fragile pickaxe. It can only mine a small amount of things before breaking apart.

name: Rotten Flesh
description: A disgusting drop from killing zombies. This can be used to brew potions.

name: Spider Eye
description: A drop from killing spiders. This can be used to brew potions.

name: Gunpowder
description: A drop from killing creepers. This can be used to brew potions.

name: Pearl
description: A rare drop from a rare monster. It emit a strange power towards the sky.

name: Stone
description: A hard material. Can be used to make somewhat good tools.

name: Stone Pickaxe
description: A somewhat reliable pickaxe. It can mine slightly more stuff.

name: Stone Sword
description: A somewhat reliable sword. Don't expect it to kill many stuff.

name: Iron
description: A fairly modern material. It can be used to craft pretty good tools.

name: Iron Pickaxe
description: A pretty good pickaxe. It can mine some of the rarer materials in the Overworld.

name: Iron Sword
description: A pretty good sword. It can slay more enemies.

name: Diamond
description: A rare material that shines brightly under the sun. It can be used to craft very good tools that last even longer.

name: Diamond Pickaxe
description: A good pickaxe that can mine some hard objects and last quite a while.

name: Diamond Sword
description: A good sword that can slay even more enemies and last even longer.

name: Obsidian
description: A volcanic glass that's hard to mine. They seems to give a mysterious energy linked to the underground.

name: Overworld Ticket
description: A one-way ticket to the surface of the World.

name: Nether Ticket
description: A one-way ticket to the underworld.

name: Redstone
description: A common red rock that can be used as a way to extend potion durability.
